sections.heading: Mortgages; mortgagor retains legal title, when; security interest in rents; effect
sections.text: In the absence of stipulations to the contrary, the mortgagor of real estate retains the legal title and right of possession thereof. This section shall not limit or otherwise affect the creation, provision, assignmen

sections.heading: to quitclaim deed which is in effect a mortgage. Helming v. Forrester, 92 Neb. 284, 138 N.W. 190 (1912).
sections.text: to quitclaim deed which is in effect a mortgage. Helming v. Forrester, 92 Neb. 284, 138 N.W. 190 (1912).
